subtitles.text: Thank you for watching!
Idol Divine Voice Battle
In this program, two sparkling idol groups will put their pride on the line and go head-to-head!
They will show off their singing voices and decide which idol has the voice of God.
By the way, my name is Molly, an android dj from the near future, and I'm looking forward to working with you.
Thank you very much, ladies and gentlemen, for this exciting battle of vocal talents, we'd like to introduce to you our newest idol.
First of all, let's start with sq 48.
Yes, we are STU48. Please give them my best regards.
Please give them my best regards.
And now, here to compete with STU48 are the Fruit Zippers.
We are Fruit Zipper.
Please give us your best regards.
Click here to see the battle of the divine voices that you will be challenging this time.
Related Tan Karaoke
In "3 Rensoku Karaoke", 3 representatives from each group sing one song each and score each time. The game is cleared when the three singers are right.
If both teams are right or wrong, the total score of the three will be the group's score and the winner will be decided.
The singing ability is of course a must, but the management of who will sing among the members and what they will sing is also tested.
